overview:
Michael Fleischner is an Internet marketing expert with more than 14 years of marketing experience. He has appeared on ABC World News, The TODAY Show, Bloomberg Radio, and other major media with experience in all types of marketing including advertising, direct marketing, Internet marketing, market research, and trade show management.

Michael is also a search engine optimization specialist and Internet marketing expert. His first publication, SEO Made Simple, is the top selling SEO book on Amazon.com and a variety of additional retail outlets. Michael has consulted for fortune 1000 companies on improving website rankings and online reputation.

In addition to helping others with website prominence, Michael is the founder of the Internets largest free resource for marketers, MarketingScoop.com which commands top search engine rankings for very competitive marketing related keywords and keyword phrases.

Michael’s SEO consulting businesses include UpwardSEO.com and UpwardSEOconsulting.com. He blogs on a regular basis on the number one rated marketing blog, sharing his expertise about internet marketing, search engine optimization, and traditional marketing.
